## Prerequisite
Statistics I (MATH 1240) 

## Schedule (subject to change)

### 1. Explore - 01/09, 01/23  
- Visualization  
- Data transformation  
- Exploratory analysis  

### 2. Wrangle - 01/30, 02/06
- Data import
- Data organization in tibbles
- Relational data operations
- Handling text, categories and datetimes

### 3. Program - 02/13, 02/20
- Pipes
- Functions
- Data structures
- Iteration

### 4. Model - 03/06, 03/13
- Basics
- Model building
- Handling many models

### 5. Communicate - 03/20, 03/27
- R markdown
- Visualization for communication
- Other communication products

### 6. Automate or Deploy - 04/03, 04/10
- Shiny web applications
- R packages

### 7. Project presentations - 04/17, 04/24 [Schedule](#anchor)
